title: Keeper - Security and Risk Events
description: This dashboard provides monitoring of security events and risk detections from Keeper. The BreachWatch add-on must be enabled to receive BreachWatch events.

definition.content:
**[Keeper](https://www.keepersecurity.com/)** is a zero-knowledge password management solution that helps organizations securely store, share, and manage credentials across users, devices, and applications.

This dashboard provides monitoring of security events and risk detections from Keeper. 

**Note**: The **BreachWatch** add-on must be enabled to receive BreachWatch events. After enabling the add-on, please refer [these steps](https://docs.keeper.io/en/enterprise-guide/event-reporting#enabling-breachwatch-events) to allow external logging of BreachWatch events.

For more information, see the [Keeper Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/keeper/).

**Tip**:
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Top Users by Security Benchmark Updates

search.query: source:keeper @evt.name:(added_admin_key OR vault_transferred OR lock_user OR enterprise_2fa_disabled_by_admin OR delete_user OR added_to_role OR device_approved_by_admin OR enable_user OR expire_password OR pending_added_to_role OR pending_removed_from_role OR removed_from_role OR send_invitation) $enterprise_id $user_login $event_category $ip $event_name
source:keeper @evt.name:(send_invitation OR accept_invitation OR auto_invite_user OR delete_pending_user OR enable_user OR accept_transfer) $enterprise_id $user_login $event_category $ip $event_name

definition.title: Disallowed IP Login Attempts by Location

search.query: source:keeper @evt.name:(set_two_factor_off OR two_factor_disabled_by_support OR enterprise_2fa_disabled_by_admin OR scim_access_failure) $enterprise_id $user_login $event_category $ip $event_name

definition.title: Password Expired by Admin Event Details

query.query_string: source:keeper @evt.name:(device_admin_approval_requested OR device_user_approval_requested OR device_approved OR device_approved_by_admin) $enterprise_id $user_login $event_category $ip $event_name

definition.title: Top Users who Declined Recovery Setup

query.query_string: source:keeper @evt.name:(added_to_role OR removed_from_role OR pending_added_to_role OR pending_removed_from_role) $enterprise_id $user_login $event_category $ip $event_name

definition.title: Top Users based on High-Risk Password Detections
Top Regions based on High-Risk Password Detections
Top Users who Ignored High-Risk Password Detections
